author: 5d79ccc06e87aa8a83efcc2c
content: It was beyond my imagination that my AirBnB experience could be better than a 5 star resort hotel. It is one of the most beautiful villa that I have had stayed so far in the many countries travelled so far. The pictures have not sufficiently described the details of the place.

author: 5d79ccc06e87aa8a83efcc2c
content: The villa was spacious and bright and the garden nicely decorated with trees and plants- furniture was modern and breakfast was nice!

author: 5d79ccc06e87aa8a83efcc2c
content: We both enjoyed our stay at the tropical suite villa, itâ€™s a lovely peaceful place with a nice pool perfect for relaxing. It was ideal to stay for a couple nights amongst our trip to Bali.
An excellent place to stay in Canggu!
author: 5d79ccc06e87aa8a83efcc2c

content: Lovely and private! Big comfy bed, nice cooling pool and the privacy was second to none.
author: 5d79ccc06e87aa8a83efcc2c

content: Overall the villa was pretty decent value. Surty is great host and was kind and helpfull! The bed was very large, however I would of liked a duvet instead of just a sheet.
author: 5d79ccc06e87aa8a83efcc2c

content: Really lovely, quiet, clean space with amazingly friendly hosts who are readily available to help.
author: 5d79ccc06e87aa8a83efcc2c
